name: GGO demo
description:
This game is a short VR demo i created to play with the bullet line and lightsaber bullet block mechanics that were shown in the sao II anime.

In the video i was using free locomotion but in the game there is only teleportation because the free locomotion doesn't work when i package the demo from UE4.

The default bindings won't let you teleport so it's highly recommended to change your bindings to the following:

-Grip button = Grab Left/Right

-Trigger button = TriggerLeft/Right

The Trackpad button select it as a trackpad and add these 2 options:

-Touch or Click option, depends on headset: TeleportLeft/Right

-Position: MotionControllerThumbLeft/Right

Also disable the haptics because the rumbling is annoying

Your lightsaber trail might not show sometimes, for it to show restart the game.
